tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE team_communication_log (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    recipient_id INT,
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE communication_log (
  log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  sender VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  receiver VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE communication_logs (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_id INT NOT NULL,
  receiver_id INT NOT NULL,
  message TEXT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE accountability_logs (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  action VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  responsible_id INT NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE team_members (member_id INT PRIMARY KEY, member_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, role VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE messages (message_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, sender_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_id INT NOT NULL, message_text TEXT NOT NULL, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE message_logs (log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, message_id UUID NOT NULL, sender_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_id INT NOT NULL, action_performed VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, log_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE message_attachments (attachment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, message_id UUID NOT NULL, attachment_url VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE TeamMembers (member_id INT PRIMARY KEY, member_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL) CREATE TABLE CommunicationLogs (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, sender_id INT NOT NULL, receiver_id INT NOT NULL, message TEXT NOT NULL, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL) CREATE TABLE Meetings (meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY, topic VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, date DATE NOT NULL, time TIME NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(100)) CREATE TABLE Attendance (attendance_id INT PRIMARY KEY, meeting_id INT NOT NULL, member_id INT NOT NULL, date DATE NOT NULL) CREATE TABLE TaskAssignments (task_id INT PRIMARY KEY, assigner_id INT NOT NULL, assignee_id INT NOT NULL, task_description TEXT NOT NULL, deadline DATE NOT NULL)
